english_example_sentence: Close friends often have a pleasant time by meeting at school.
russian_example_sentence: Близкие друзья часто приятно проводят время, встречаясь в школе.
turkish_example_sentence: Yakın arkadaşlar okulda sık sık buluşarak keyifli vakit geçirirler.
